                    <div class="baoliao-block">
            <div class="name one-line">爆料原文：</div><p itemprop="description">京东金融，9.9元开通白条省钱卡轻享版月～</p>        </div>
              <div class="baoliao-block"> <div class="name"><strong class="one-line">小编补充：</strong></div><p itemprop="description">京东金融白条省钱卡，限时9.9元开通立享13项省钱特权，可免费领网易云音乐VIP周卡、5元美团外卖券、4元无门槛白条支付券、1元无门槛话费券、1元无门槛白条还款券等。<br></p><p itemprop="description"><br></p><p itemprop="description"><img itemprop="image" alt="京东金融 白条省钱卡 9.9元开通轻享版月卡" src="https://qny.smzdm.com/202503/26/67e36ff8d1ade2308.jpg_e600.jpg" _size="126996" title="" data-title=""></p> </div>

        <!--本文收录模块 商城、品牌、分类信息、三级标签-->
    <div class="artic-label-box">
      <div class="label-title">
          本文收录在
      </div>
      <!-- 推荐标签 -->
      <div class="experience-meta-nowrap">
          <div class="m-an">
              <span class="pack-an">展开<i class="icon-angle-down-o-thin"></i></span>
              <span class="pack-up">收起<i class="icon-angle-up-o-thin"></i></span>
          </div>
          <ul class="z-clearfix">
                                                                      <li>
                      <div class="meta-tags">
                          <a href="https://www.smzdm.com/fenlei/quan%2Fhongbao/" target="_blank" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210007','type':'category','tag':'券/红包'});sensors.track('DetailModelClick', {'business':'好价','model_name':'本文收录在','sub_model_name':'category','button_name':'券/红包'})">
                            <span><i class="icon-category-o"></i></span>
                            券/红包                          </a>

<!-- 最新好价挂件 -->

        <!-- column流标题 -->

        <div class="z-side-title">

        </div>
    </div>
        <ul class="side-change J_hover_show  show ">
                <li class="active">
            <div class="side-max">
                <a href="https://www.smzdm.com/p/144637723/" target="_blank" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210010','name':'最新好价','pagetitle':'京东金融 白条省钱卡 9.9元开通轻享版月卡'})">
